Description: A hearty meat, vegetable, and chickpea stew often served with naan bread
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g basmati rice, 1kg lamb, 2 large carrots, 100g raisins, 50g slivered almonds, 1 large onion, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cardamom, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 tsp saffron, 100g yogurt, 4 tbsp vegetable oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside
 Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add lamb and brown
 Add spices, yogurt, and water, simmer until lamb is tender
 Julienne carrots, fry until soft, add raisins and almonds
 Layer rice and lamb, top with carrot mix, bake 30 mins

Description: Savory pastries filled with spinach and cheese, layered in thin, flaky dough
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg lamb, 2 cups yogurt, 4 eggs, 4 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp flour, 2 cloves garlic, salt, black pepper, oregano
 Instructions: Brown lamb in butter, season with salt, pepper, oregano
 Transfer to baking dish
 Mix yogurt, eggs, flour, and garlic, pour over lamb
 Bake at 180°C for 45 mins until golden

Description: A rich, slow-cooked stew of lamb, vegetables, and a mix of spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g couscous, 500g lamb or chicken, 2 onions, 4 carrots, 2 zucchinis, 1 can chickpeas, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp harissa, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt, olive oil
 Instructions: Steam couscous and set aside
 Sauté onions, add meat and brown
 Add spices, tomato paste, and water, simmer until meat is tender
 Add carrots, zucchinis, and chickpeas, cook until vegetables are tender
 Serve meat and vegetables over couscous

Description: A traditional stew of meat, vegetables, and sometimes pasta, often cooked slowly over a wood fire
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g pork ribs, 500g veal, 500g chicken, 200g sausage, 2 potatoes, 1 large carrot, 1 leek, 1 turnip, 1 cabbage, 200g chickpeas, 2 cloves garlic, 1 onion, salt, black pepper
 Instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight
 Boil all meats in water, skim off foam
 Add chickpeas, simmer 1 hour
 Add chopped vegetables, cook until tender
 Season with salt and pepper
 Serve hot

Description: A flavorful stew made with chicken, okra, and palm oil, served with rice or funge
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp chili powder, 200g palm oil, 200g okra, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces, season with salt, pepper, paprika
 Sauté onions and garlic in palm oil, add chicken and brown
 Add tomatoes, tomato paste, chili powder, and water, simmer until chicken is tender
 Add okra, cook until soft
 Serve with rice or funge

Description: A hearty, spicy soup made with leafy greens, okra, and often seafood or meat
Recipe:
Ingredients: 200g cornmeal, 1 liter water, 200g spinach, 200g okra, 2 eggplants, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 200g salted meat, 200g pig's tail, 200g fresh beef, 1 tbsp thyme, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Boil salted meat and pig's tail, discard water
 Add fresh beef, cook until tender
 Sauté onions and garlic, add vegetables, cook until soft
 Add meat, season with thyme, salt, pepper
 For fungee, boil water, gradually add cornmeal, stir until thick
 Serve fungee with pepperpot

Description: A popular barbecue of various meats, typically including beef ribs and sausages, grilled slowly over an open fire
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef ribs, 1kg chorizo, 1kg morcilla, 1kg chinchulines, coarse salt
 Instructions: Prepare the grill with hot coals
 Season meats with coarse salt
 Place ribs on the grill, cook slowly over low heat for 2-3 hours
 Add chorizo, morcilla, and chinchulines, cook until done
 Serve with chimichurri sauce

Description: Spicy sausages made with ground beef or lamb, seasoned with garlic and a mix of spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup hulled wheat, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 2 tbsp butter, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Soak wheat overnight
 Cook chicken in water until tender, shred meat
 Sauté onions in butter, add shredded chicken
 Add soaked wheat to chicken broth, simmer until thick and creamy
 Mix in chicken and onions, season with salt and pepper
 Serve hot

Description: A classic British-origin meat pie filled with minced meat, gravy, and vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g minced beef, 1 onion, 1 carrot, 1 celery stick, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp flour, 1 cup beef stock, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 sheets puff pastry, 1 egg
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, carrot, and celery in oil until soft
 Add minced beef, cook until browned
 Stir in flour, cook for 1 minute
 Add beef stock and Worcestershire sauce, simmer until thickened
 Line pie dish with puff pastry, add filling, cover with pastry lid
 Brush with beaten egg, bake at 200°C for 25-30 mins until golden

Description: A breaded and fried veal cutlet, traditionally served with potato salad or lingonberry sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 veal cutlets, 1 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1 cup breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, butter or oil for frying
 Instructions: Pound veal cutlets thin, season with salt and pepper
 Dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, coat with breadcrumbs
 Heat butter or oil in a pan, fry cutlets until golden brown on both sides
 Drain on paper towels, serve with lemon wedges

Description: A rice pilaf made with saffron, layered with meat, dried fruits, and aromatic herbs
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1kg lamb, 2 onions, 2 carrots, 1 cup dried apricots, 1 cup raisins, 1/2 cup slivered almonds, 1 tsp saffron, 4 tbsp butter, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside
 Sauté onions in butter, add lamb and brown
 Add carrots, apricots, raisins, almonds, and saffron, simmer until lamb is tender
 Layer rice and lamb mixture, bake at 180°C for 30 mins

Description: A rich and creamy conch chowder, flavored with coconut milk and spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 conch fillets, 1 cup flour, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp paprika, salt, pepper, oil for frying
 Instructions: Pound conch fillets thin
 Mix flour with garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper
 Dredge conch in seasoned flour
 Heat oil in a pan, fry conch until golden brown
 Serve with dipping sauce

Description: A spiced chicken and rice dish, cooked with a blend of fragrant spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp baharat spice mix, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup slivered almonds, 4 tbsp ghee, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside
 Sauté onions and garlic in ghee, add chicken and brown
 Add tomatoes, spices, raisins, and almonds, simmer until chicken is tender
 Layer rice and chicken mixture, bake at 180°C for 30 mins

Description: A mixed rice dish with fish, meat, vegetables, eggs, and spices, often served on special occasions
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg fish fillets, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger paste, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp chili powder, 1 cup coconut milk, 4 tbsp mustard oil, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in mustard oil
 Add tomatoes and spices, cook until tomatoes are soft
 Add fish fillets, cook until fish is done
 Stir in coconut milk, simmer for 10 mins
 Serve with rice

Description: A cornmeal and okra dish often served with flying fish, and flavored with herbs and spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 flying fish fillets, 1 cup cornmeal, 2 cups okra, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tomato, 1 lime, 1 tbsp butter, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Season fish with lime juice, salt, and pepper
 Sauté onions, garlic, and tomato in butter
 Add fish, cook until done
 Boil okra, add cornmeal gradually, stir until thick
 Serve fish over cou-cou

Description: A hearty soup made from beetroot, meat, and vegetables, served hot or cold
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 potatoes, 1 onion, 1 egg, 2 tbsp flour, salt, pepper, oil for frying
 Instructions: Grate potatoes and onion
 Mix with egg, flour, salt, and pepper
 Heat oil in a pan, drop spoonfuls of the mixture, flatten slightly
 Fry until golden brown on both sides
 Serve hot with sour cream

Description: A traditional beef and onion stew made with beer, often served with fries
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg mussels, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup white wine, 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp parsley, salt, pepper, 4 large potatoes, oil for frying
 Instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in butter
 Add mussels, white wine, salt, and pepper, cook until mussels open
 Sprinkle with parsley
 Cut potatoes into fries, fry in hot oil until golden and crispy
 Serve mussels with fries

Description: A rice and beans dish cooked in coconut milk, served with stew chicken and fried plantains
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1 cup red kidney beans, 1 onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp black pepper, salt, oil
 Instructions: Soak beans overnight
 Cook beans with onion, garlic, bell pepper until tender
 Add rice, coconut milk, thyme, black pepper, and salt
 Simmer until rice is cooked
 Serve with stewed chicken or fish

Description: A slow-cooked peanut stew with chicken, often served with rice or fufu
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g peanuts, 1 tsp ginger powder, 1 tsp chili powder, salt
 Instructions: Roast peanuts and grind into a paste
 Mix with ginger powder, chili powder, and salt
 Shape into small balls or sticks
 Fry in hot oil until golden brown
 Serve as a snack

Description: A spicy stew of chilies and cheese, often served with red rice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 200g green chilies, 200g cheese (feta or farmer's cheese), 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp butter, salt
 Instructions: Slice chilies, onion, tomatoes, and garlic
 Sauté onions and garlic in butter
 Add chilies, tomatoes, and cheese, cook until cheese melts
 Season with salt
 Serve with red rice

Description: A savory pastry filled with meat, potatoes, peas, and spices, baked until golden
Recipe:
Ingredients: Dough: 4 cups flour, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup butter, 1 egg, 1 cup warm water; Filling: 500g beef or chicken, 2 onions, 2 potatoes, 1 cup peas, 1 cup beef broth, 1 tbsp paprika, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tbsp oregano, salt, pepper, 2 hard-boiled eggs, 1/4 cup olives
 Instructions: Make dough by mixing flour, sugar, butter, egg, and water, let rest
 Cook meat with onions, potatoes, peas, broth, and spices until tender
 Add chopped hard-boiled eggs and olives
 Roll out dough, cut into circles, fill with meat mixture
 Fold and seal edges, bake at 200°C for 25-30 mins until golden

Description: Grilled minced meat sausages, often served with flatbread and onions
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 500g ground lamb, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp baking soda, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly, refrigerate for a few hours
 Shape into small sausages
 Grill or fry until cooked through
 Serve with pita bread and onions

Description: A traditional meat stew made with beef and flavored with a variety of vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 bay leaf, salt, water
 Instructions: Boil beef with onions, garlic, bay leaf, and salt until very tender
 Shred the meat, mash with a pestle
 Serve with pap (maize porridge) or rice

Description: A black bean stew with pork, often served with rice, collard greens, and orange slices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g black beans, 1kg assorted pork cuts (ribs, sausages, bacon), 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 2 bay leaves, salt, pepper, 1 orange
 Instructions: Soak beans overnight
 Cook beans with pork, onions, garlic, bay leaves, salt, and pepper until tender
 Add orange slices, simmer for 10 mins
 Serve with rice and orange slices

Description: A chicken and rice dish cooked with coconut milk and spices, often served during festivals
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g sago starch, 1 liter water, salt, 200g fish, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 chili, 1 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 tbsp shrimp paste
 Instructions: Mix sago starch with water, cook until thick and sticky
 Boil fish with onion, garlic, chili, tamarind paste, and shrimp paste until tender
 Serve sago with fish sauce

Description: A traditional pastry made of layered filo dough filled with a mixture of eggs, yogurt, and feta cheese
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g filo pastry, 400g feta cheese, 4 eggs, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tsp baking soda, 1/2 cup melted butter
 Instructions: Mix crumbled feta, eggs, yogurt, and baking soda
 Layer filo pastry in a baking dish, brushing with melted butter
 Add cheese mixture, repeat layers
 Bake at 180°C for 30-40 mins until golden brown

Description: A savory peanut butter and tomato stew with meat, typically served with rice or millet
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 500g chicken or beef, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 carrots, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp tomato paste, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil
 Add meat and brown
 Add tomatoes, tomato paste, carrots, thyme, salt, and pepper
 Add rice and water, simmer until rice is cooked
 Serve hot

Description: A thick porridge made from cassava or cornmeal, often served with a vegetable or meat sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup wheat grains, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp cumin, 1 tsp cardamom, salt, pepper, water
 Instructions: Boil wheat grains until tender
 Cook chicken with onions, garlic, cumin, cardamom, salt, and pepper until tender
 Shred chicken, mix with wheat grains
 Simmer until thick
 Serve hot

Description: A dish made from fermented cassava, often served with fried fish and a spicy sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g cassava couscous (attiéké), 500g fish, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 chili, 1 lime, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Steam attiéké and set aside
 Marinate fish with lime juice, salt, and pepper
 Fry fish until golden
 Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, and chili in oil
 Serve fish with attiéké and sauce

Description: A rich stew of beans, corn, sweet potatoes, and often sausage or pork
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups hominy corn, 1 cup kidney beans, 500g pork, 500g sausage, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, 1 bay leaf, 1 tsp paprika, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Soak corn and beans overnight
 Cook pork with onions, garlic, tomatoes, bay leaf, and paprika until tender
 Add soaked corn and beans, simmer until soft
 Add sausage, cook for another 30 mins
 Serve hot

Description: A traditional dish featuring fish cooked in coconut milk with spices, steamed in banana leaves
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fish fillets, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 tbsp fish sauce, 1 tbsp palm sugar, 2 eggs, 4 kaffir lime leaves, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp lemongrass, 1 tsp galangal, banana leaves, salt
 Instructions: Blend turmeric, lemongrass, and galangal into a paste
 Mix coconut milk, fish sauce, palm sugar, eggs, and spice paste
 Place fish in banana leaves, pour mixture over fish, fold leaves into packets
 Steam for 20 minutes
 Serve hot

Description: A spicy stew made with bitterleaf or spinach, meat, ground peanuts, and spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g bitterleaf or spinach, 1kg beef or fish, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup ground peanuts, 1 cup shrimp, 1 tbsp crayfish, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Boil bitterleaf, rinse to reduce bitterness
 Cook meat or fish with onions and garlic until tender
 Add ground peanuts, shrimp, and crayfish, simmer
 Add bitterleaf, cook until sauce thickens
 Season with salt and pepper
 Serve hot

Description: A dish of fries topped with cheese curds and smothered in hot gravy
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 large potatoes, 1 cup cheese curds, 2 cups beef gravy, oil for frying
 Instructions: Cut potatoes into fries, fry in hot oil until golden and crispy
 Place fries on a plate, sprinkle with cheese curds
 Pour hot beef gravy over fries and cheese
 Serve immediately

Description: A flavorful chicken stew cooked with palm butter, onions, garlic, and tomatoes
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp chili powder, 200g palm oil, 200g okra, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces, season with salt, pepper, paprika
 Sauté onions and garlic in palm oil, add chicken and brown
 Add tomatoes, tomato paste, chili powder, and water, simmer until chicken is tender
 Add okra, cook until soft
 Serve with rice or funge

Description: A staple food made from millet flour, cooked into a thick porridge
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups millet flour, 1 liter water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water with a pinch of salt
 Gradually add millet flour, stirring constantly
 Cook until mixture thickens and pulls away from the sides of the pot
 Shape into balls and serve with sauce

Description: A savory pie with a filling of beef, onions, olives, and hard-boiled eggs, topped with a sweet corn mixture
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, 4 cups corn kernels, 1 cup milk, 2 eggs, 1/4 cup olives, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add ground beef and brown
 Add cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper, cook until meat is done
 Blend corn kernels with milk, cook until thick
 Layer meat, olives, and hard-boiled eggs in a baking dish
 Cover with corn mixture, bake at 180°C for 30 mins until golden

Description: A famous roasted duck dish with crispy skin, often served with pancakes, hoisin sauce, and green onions
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole duck, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup hoisin sauce, 2 tbsp rice vinegar, 2 tsp five-spice powder, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp sugar, green onions, pancakes
 Instructions: Prick duck skin, pour boiling water over to tighten skin
 Mix soy sauce, honey, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, five-spice powder, salt, and sugar
 Brush mixture over duck, let marinate for several hours
 Roast duck at 180°C for 1.5-2 hours until crispy
 Serve with green onions and pancakes

Description: A large platter including rice, beans, fried plantain, chorizo, pork belly, and eggs
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup white rice, 1 cup red beans, 1 plantain, 1 avocado, 4 chorizo sausages, 4 eggs, 1 cup pork belly, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside
 Boil beans until tender
 Fry plantain and pork belly until crispy
 Grill chorizo and fry eggs
 Assemble rice, beans, plantain, chorizo, pork belly, and eggs on a platter
 Serve with avocado slices

Description: A luxurious dish of lobster cooked in a creamy coconut milk sauce flavored with vanilla
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 lobsters, 1 vanilla bean, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 tbsp butter, 1 lemon, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Split vanilla bean, scrape seeds into coconut milk, heat gently
 Boil lobsters until done, remove meat
 Sauté lobster meat in butter, add coconut milk and vanilla
 Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
 Serve hot

Description: A traditional dish of cooked cassava leaves with ground peanuts and palm oil
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g cassava leaves, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup palm oil, 1 cup ground peanuts, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Boil cassava leaves until tender, drain
 Sauté onions and garlic in palm oil
 Add cassava leaves and ground peanuts, simmer
 Season with salt and pepper
 Serve hot

Description: A traditional breakfast dish of rice and beans, cooked with onions, garlic, and bell pepper
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked white rice, 1 cup cooked black beans, 1 onion, 1 red bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp Lizano sauce, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil
 Add rice and beans, cook until heated through
 Stir in Lizano sauce, season with salt and pepper
 Serve hot

Description: A slow-cooked dish of meat and vegetables, often baked under an iron bell
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg lamb or veal, 4 potatoes, 2 carrots, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, 1 cup white wine, rosemary, salt, pepper, olive oil
 Instructions: Cut meat and vegetables into chunks
 Place in a baking dish, drizzle with olive oil, add rosemary, salt, and pepper
 Cover and bake at 180°C for 2 hours, occasionally basting with white wine
 Serve hot

Description: A shredded beef stew cooked with tomatoes, onions, and peppers, often served with rice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g flank steak, 2 onions, 1 green bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 cup beef broth, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, salt, pepper, olive oil
 Instructions: Cook flank steak in beef broth until tender, shred meat
 Sauté onions, bell pepper, and garlic in olive oil
 Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, shredded meat, cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper
 Simmer until sauce thickens
 Serve hot with rice

Description: Large chunks of meat marinated with herbs, skewered, and grilled over an open flame
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg pork or lamb, 4 cloves garlic, 2 lemons, 1 tbsp oregano, 1/4 cup olive oil, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cut meat into large chunks
 Marinate with minced garlic, lemon juice, oregano, olive oil, salt, and pepper for several hours
 Skewer meat and grill over charcoal until cooked through
 Serve hot

Description: A braised beef dish served with a creamy vegetable sauce and dumplings
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef sirloin, 2 onions, 2 carrots, 2 parsnips, 1 celery root, 1 cup cream, 2 tbsp flour, 4 cloves, 4 allspice berries, 2 bay leaves, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tbsp sugar, salt, pepper, butter
 Instructions: Brown beef in butter, set aside
 Sauté onions, carrots, parsnips, and celery root in butter
 Add beef, cloves, allspice, bay leaves, vinegar, and sugar
 Cover with water, simmer until beef is tender
 Remove beef, blend vegetables into a sauce, stir in cream and flour
 Season with salt and pepper
 Serve sauce over sliced beef

Description: A flavorful chicken stew cooked with palm butter, onions, garlic, and tomatoes
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 cup palm butter, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces, brown in oil
 Add chopped onions, garlic, and tomatoes, cook until soft
 Add palm butter, season with salt and pepper, simmer until chicken is tender
 Serve with rice or fufu

Description: Pan-fried meatballs made of ground pork, often served with potatoes and gravy
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground pork, 1 onion, 1 egg, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup milk, salt, pepper, butter for frying
 Instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly
 Shape into small balls
 Fry in butter until golden brown and cooked through
 Serve with boiled potatoes and gravy

Description: A fragrant rice dish with lamb, onions, garlic, tomatoes, and spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g lamb, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cardamom, 1 cup rice, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown lamb in oil
 Add chopped onions, garlic, and tomatoes, cook until soft
 Add spices, rice, and water, simmer until rice is cooked and lamb is tender
 Serve hot

Description: A hearty, spicy soup made with leafy greens, okra, and often seafood or meat
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g callaloo leaves or spinach, 1 onion, 1 tomato, 2 cloves garlic, 1 scotch bonnet pepper, 1 cup coconut milk, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Sauté chopped onions, garlic, and tomato in oil
 Add callaloo leaves, cook until wilted
 Add coconut milk, scotch bonnet pepper, salt, and pepper, simmer until flavors meld
 Serve hot

Description: A traditional meal consisting of rice, red beans, and meat, typically served with salad
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 2 cups white rice, 1 cup red beans, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 bell pepper, 1 tomato, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook beef with onions, garlic, bell pepper, and tomato until tender
 Cook rice and beans separately
 Serve beef with rice and beans on the side

Description: A hearty fish stew with yuca, onions, tomatoes, and spices, often served with lemon
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g tuna, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp oregano, 2 cups yuca, 1 lemon, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Boil tuna, flake and set aside
 Sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes in oil
 Add cumin, oregano, yuca, and water, simmer until yuca is tender
 Add flaked tuna, season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice
 Serve hot

Description: A popular street food of rice, lentils, macaroni, and spicy tomato sauce, topped with fried onions
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup rice, 1 cup lentils, 1 cup macaroni, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook rice, lentils, and macaroni separately
 Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add tomato sauce and spices, simmer
 Layer rice, lentils, and macaroni on a plate, top with sauce
 Serve hot

Description: Thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, beans, and sometimes meat, grilled until crispy
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups masa harina, 1 cup water, 1 cup cheese, 1 cup refried beans, salt
 Instructions: Mix masa harina with water and salt to form dough
 Flatten dough, fill with cheese and beans, fold and seal
 Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown
 Serve hot

Description: A traditional stew of corn, beans, and vegetables, often flavored with palm oil
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup corn kernels, 1 cup lima beans, 1 onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, salt, pepper, butter
 Instructions: Sauté chopped onions, garlic, and bell pepper in butter
 Add corn, lima beans, and tomatoes, cook until tender
 Season with salt and pepper
 Serve hot

Description: A spicy beef stew made with berbere spice, often served with injera (a type of flatbread)
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp berbere spice, 1 cup beef broth, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté chopped onions and garlic in oil
 Add beef and brown
 Add tomatoes, berbere spice, and beef broth, simmer until beef is tender
 Season with salt and pepper
 Serve with injera

Description: Blood sausages made with pork, barley, and spices, traditionally served during winter holidays
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g pork, 200g barley, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp allspice, 1 tsp marjoram, 1 tsp black pepper, salt, sausage casings
 Instructions: Cook barley until tender
 Mix with minced pork, chopped onions, garlic, and spices
 Stuff mixture into sausage casings
 Bake or boil until cooked through
 Serve hot

Description: A traditional beef stew served over a thick maize porridge
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup maize meal, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté chopped onions and garlic in oil
 Add beef and brown
 Add tomatoes and water, simmer until beef is tender
 Cook maize meal with water to make porridge
 Serve beef stew over maize porridge

Description: A spicy chicken stew made with berbere spice and hard-boiled eggs, served with injera
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tsp berbere spice, 1 cup chicken broth, 4 hard-boiled eggs, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger in oil
 Add chicken and brown
 Add berbere spice and chicken broth, simmer until chicken is tender
 Add hard-boiled eggs, season with salt and pepper
 Serve with injera

Description: A raw fish salad marinated in lemon juice and mixed with coconut milk, onions, and tomatoes
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fish fillets, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 lemon, 1 onion, 1 tomato, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Dice fish fillets, marinate in lemon juice and salt for 30 mins
 Drain, mix with chopped onions and tomatoes
 Add coconut milk, season with salt and pepper
 Serve chilled

Description: A hearty stew of beef and pork, cooked with onions, potatoes, and carrots until tender
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 500g pork, 2 onions, 4 potatoes, 2 carrots, 1 tsp allspice, salt, pepper, water
 Instructions: Cut meat into chunks, place in a pot with chopped onions, potatoes, and carrots
 Add allspice, salt, and pepper, cover with water
 Simmer until meat is tender
 Serve hot

Description: A classic French dish of chicken braised with wine, mushrooms, and onions
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 cup red wine, 2 onions, 2 carrots, 200g mushrooms, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 2 tbsp flour, 4 strips bacon, 2 tbsp butter, salt, pepper, thyme, bay leaf
 Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces, brown in butter. Add bacon, onions, carrots, and garlic, cook until soft. Stir in flour and tomato paste, cook for 1 min. Add wine, mushrooms, thyme, and bay leaf, simmer until chicken is tender. Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

Description: A Gabonese dish featuring chicken cooked in palm nut sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1 cup palm nut sauce, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cut chicken into pieces, brown in oil. Add chopped onions, garlic, and tomatoes, cook until soft. Add palm nut sauce, ginger, salt, and pepper, simmer until chicken is tender. Serve with rice or plantains.

Description: A Gambian groundnut stew made with meat and vegetables, served over rice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g meat (beef or chicken), 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup peanut butter, 2 tbsp tomato paste, 2 cups water, 1 tsp chili powder, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Brown meat in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes until soft. Stir in peanut butter, tomato paste, and water, cook until smooth. Add meat, chili powder, salt, and pepper, simmer until meat is tender. Serve with rice.

Description: A Georgian cheese-filled bread, often topped with an egg
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup water, 1 cup cheese (feta or sulguni), 1 egg, 1 tbsp yeast, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp sugar
 Instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, sugar, and water to form dough. Let rise for 1 hour. Roll out dough, fill with cheese, fold edges to enclose filling. Bake at 200°C for 20 mins. Crack egg on top, bake for another 5 mins. Serve hot.

Description: A German pot roast, typically made with marinated beef
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef, 2 onions, 2 carrots, 2 cloves garlic, 2 cups red wine, 1 cup vinegar, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp peppercorns, 1 tsp juniper berries, 2 bay leaves, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Marinate beef in wine, vinegar, sugar, peppercorns, juniper berries, and bay leaves for 3 days. Brown meat in oil, add onions, carrots, and garlic, cook until soft. Add marinade, simmer until meat is tender. Serve with potatoes or dumplings.

Description: A popular West African dish of rice cooked in a flavorful tomato and pepper sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 4 tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup tomato paste, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp curry powder, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown chicken in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, and bell pepper until soft. Stir in tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper. Add rice and chicken, cover with water, simmer until rice is cooked and chicken is tender. Serve hot.

Description: A Greek casserole made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 eggplants, 500g ground beef, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, 1 cup béchamel sauce, 1 cup grated cheese, 1 tsp cinnamon, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Slice and salt eggplants, let sit for 30 mins. Brown ground beef with onions, garlic, and tomatoes. Add cinnamon, salt, and pepper. Layer eggplants and meat in a baking dish, top with béchamel sauce and cheese. Bake at 180°C for 40 mins. Serve hot.

Description: The national dish of Grenada, a stew made with breadfruit, salted meat, and vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 breadfruit, 500g salted meat (pork or fish), 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 coconut, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Peel and slice breadfruit. Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add salted meat, cook until browned. Add breadfruit, coconut milk, turmeric, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cover and simmer until breadfruit is tender and liquid is absorbed. Serve hot.

Description: A traditional Guatemalan stew made with meat, vegetables, and spices, served with rice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 4 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 bell pepper, 1/4 cup pumpkin seeds, 1/4 cup sesame seeds, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp cloves, 1 tsp cumin, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Toast pumpkin and sesame seeds, grind to a powder. Brown chicken in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, and bell pepper until soft. Add ground seeds, cinnamon, cloves, cumin, salt, and pepper. Add chicken and water, simmer until tender. Serve with rice.

Description: A West African dish of chicken marinated in lemon juice and onions, then grilled
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 4 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1/2 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup mustard, 1 tbsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Marinate chicken in lemon juice, mustard, garlic, thyme, salt, and pepper for 2 hours. Brown chicken in oil, set aside. Sauté onions until caramelized. Add chicken and marinade, simmer until tender. Serve with rice.

Description: A popular West African dish of rice cooked in a flavorful tomato and pepper sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 4 tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup tomato paste, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp curry powder, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown chicken in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, and bell pepper until soft. Stir in tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper. Add rice and chicken, cover with water, simmer until rice is cooked and chicken is tender. Serve hot.

Description: A Guyanese dish of meat stewed with spices, often served with rice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef, 500g pork, 1 onion, 4 cloves garlic, 2 tbsp cassareep, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown beef and pork in oil, set aside. Sauté onion and garlic until soft. Add meat, cassareep, bay leaves, thyme, salt, and pepper. Cover with water, simmer until meat is tender. Serve with rice.

Description: A Haitian dish of marinated pork, usually served with rice and beans
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg pork, 2 limes, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 scotch bonnet pepper, 1/4 cup vinegar, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Marinate pork in lime juice, vinegar, onions, garlic, scotch bonnet, thyme, salt, and pepper for 2 hours. Brown pork in oil, add marinade, simmer until tender. Serve with rice and beans.

Description: A traditional Italian vegetable soup, often made with seasonal vegetables and beans
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables, 1 cup beans, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, 4 cups broth, 1 cup pasta, 1 tsp basil, 1 tsp oregano, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in oil, add tomatoes and mixed vegetables, cook until soft. Add broth, beans, basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Add pasta, cook until al dente. Serve hot.

Description: A Honduran dish featuring a mix of meats, beans, rice, and plantains
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 2 plantains, 2 cups rice, 1 cup red beans, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 bell pepper, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook rice and beans separately. Fry plantains until golden. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil, add beef, cook until browned. Serve beef with rice, beans, and plantains.

Description: A Hungarian stew made with meat, onions, and paprika, served with noodles or bread
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 2 tomatoes, 2 tbsp paprika, 1 tsp caraway seeds, 4 cups beef broth, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown beef in oil, set aside. Sauté onions and garlic until soft. Add beef, tomatoes, paprika, caraway seeds, salt, and pepper. Cover with broth, simmer until meat is tender. Serve with noodles or bread.

Description: A traditional Icelandic dish of fermented shark
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 shark, 1 tbsp salt
 Instructions: Clean and gut shark, cut into pieces. Bury in gravel for 6-12 weeks, allow to ferment. Hang to dry for several months. Cut into small pieces, serve.

Description: An Indian mixed rice dish made with spices, meat, and vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp garam masala, 1/2 tsp saffron, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside. Marinate chicken in yogurt, turmeric, cumin, garam masala, saffron, salt, and pepper. Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add chicken, cook until browned. Layer chicken and rice in a pot, cover, cook on low heat until tender. Serve hot.

Description: An Indonesian dish of slow-cooked beef with coconut milk and spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tbsp lemongrass, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chili powder, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and lemongrass in oil. Add beef, cook until browned. Stir in coconut milk, turmeric, chili powder, salt, and pepper. Simmer until beef is tender and sauce is thick. Serve hot.

Description: A popular Middle Eastern dish of grilled meat served with flatbread
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg lamb, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp paprika, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Marinate lamb in onions, garlic, cumin, coriander, paprika, salt, and pepper for 2 hours. Skewer meat, grill until cooked through. Serve with flatbread.

Description: Iraq's national dish, featuring grilled or roasted fish seasoned with spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole fish, 1 lemon, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp sumac, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp pepper, oil
 Instructions: Clean and score fish, marinate in lemon juice, turmeric, sumac, salt, and pepper for 1 hour. Grill fish over an open flame until cooked through. Serve with grilled onions and garlic.

Description: A traditional Irish stew made with lamb, potatoes, and carrots
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg lamb, 4 potatoes, 4 carrots, 2 onions, 1 tbsp thyme, 4 cups beef broth, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Brown lamb in a pot, set aside. Sauté onions until soft. Add lamb, potatoes, carrots, thyme, salt, pepper, and broth. Simmer until meat is tender and vegetables are cooked. Serve hot.

Description: A Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 eggs, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 4 tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil until soft. Add tomatoes, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper, simmer until thick. Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into wells, cover, cook until eggs are set. Serve hot.

Description: An iconic Italian dish, typically made with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup water, 1 tsp yeast, 1 tsp salt, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 cup mozzarella cheese, toppings of choice
 Instructions: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and water to form dough. Let rise for 1 hour. Roll out dough, top with tomato sauce, cheese, and desired toppings. Bake at 250°C for 10-15 mins. Serve hot.

Description: A Jamaican dish of salted fish cooked with ackee fruit, often served with dumplings and breadfruit
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g saltfish, 2 cans ackee, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Soak saltfish overnight, boil and flake. Sauté onions, garlic, bell pepper, and tomatoes in oil. Add saltfish, thyme, salt, and pepper, cook until combined. Gently fold in ackee, cook until heated through. Serve hot.

Description: A traditional Japanese dish of vinegared rice served with various seafood and vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, 2 cups water, 1/4 cup rice vinegar, 1 tsp sugar, 1/2 tsp salt, various seafood and vegetables
 Instructions: Rinse rice, cook with water. Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, fold into cooked rice. Slice seafood and vegetables. Shape rice into small mounds, top with seafood and vegetables. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

Description: A Jordanian dish of lamb cooked with yogurt and served over rice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg lamb, 2 cups yogurt, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cinnamon, 4 cups rice, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Brown lamb in oil, set aside. Sauté onions and garlic until soft. Add yogurt, turmeric, cumin, cinnamon, salt, and pepper, simmer. Add lamb, cook until tender. Serve over rice.

Description: A Kazakh dish of boiled meat served over flat noodles, often with onions and broth
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg meat (lamb or beef), 4 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 4 cups broth, 1 tsp cumin, salt, pepper, noodles
 Instructions: Boil meat with onions, garlic, cumin, salt, and pepper until tender. Remove meat, slice thinly. Cook noodles in broth. Serve meat over noodles with broth.

Description: A Kenyan dish of grilled meat, typically served with a side of vegetables or starch
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg meat (beef or goat), 2 lemons, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tsp chili powder, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Marinate meat in lemon juice, garlic, chili powder, salt, and pepper for 2 hours. Grill meat over charcoal until cooked through. Serve with kachumbari salad.

Description: A traditional dish from Kiribati, made with raw fish marinated in coconut cream
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fish fillets, 1 cup coconut cream, 1 lemon, 1 onion, 1 tomato, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Dice fish fillets, marinate in lemon juice and salt for 30 mins. Drain, mix with chopped onions and tomatoes. Add coconut cream, season with salt and pepper. Serve chilled.

Description: A Kuwaiti spiced rice dish with meat, typically chicken or lamb
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp baharat spice mix, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1/2 cup raisins, 1/2 cup slivered almonds, 4 tbsp ghee, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside. Sauté onions and garlic in ghee, add chicken and brown. Add tomatoes, spices, raisins, and almonds, simmer until chicken is tender. Layer rice and chicken mixture, bake at 180°C for 30 mins.

Description: A traditional Kyrgyz dish of boiled meat served over flat noodles, often with onions and broth
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg meat (lamb or beef), 4 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 4 cups broth, 1 tsp cumin, salt, pepper, noodles
 Instructions: Boil meat with onions, garlic, cumin, salt, and pepper until tender. Remove meat, slice thinly. Cook noodles in broth. Serve meat over noodles with broth.

Description: A Laotian salad made with minced meat, herbs, and lime juice
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g minced meat (chicken or pork), 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp fish sauce, 1 tbsp lime juice, 1 tsp chili flakes, fresh mint, fresh cilantro, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Cook minced meat in a pan until browned. Add chopped onions and garlic, cook until soft. Stir in fish sauce, lime juice, chili flakes, salt, and pepper. Garnish with mint and cilantro. Serve warm.

Description: A Latvian dessert soup made with rye bread, dried fruit, and whipped cream
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rye bread crumbs, 1 cup dried fruit, 1/2 cup sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 4 cups water, whipped cream
 Instructions: Boil rye bread crumbs and dried fruit in water until soft. Add sugar and cinnamon, simmer until thickened. Serve chilled with whipped cream.

Description: A Lebanese dish of ground meat and bulgur, often served raw or baked
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground meat (lamb or beef), 1 cup bulgur, 1 onion, 1 tsp allspice, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp cumin, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Soak bulgur in water until soft, drain. Mix with ground meat, chopped onion, allspice, cinnamon, cumin, salt, and pepper. Shape into balls or patties, fry in oil until golden. Serve with yogurt.

Description: A staple food in Lesotho, made from maize flour and water, served with meat or vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups maize flour, 4 cups water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water with a pinch of salt. Gradually add maize flour, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture thickens and pulls away from the sides of the pot. Shape into balls and serve with sauce.

Description: A Liberian dish of tender beef cooked in a rich and spicy palm butter sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup palm butter, 1 cup chicken broth, 1 tsp cayenne pepper, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Sauté chopped onions and garlic in oil. Add beef and brown. Stir in palm butter, chicken broth, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper. Simmer until beef is tender. Serve with rice or fufu.

Description: A Libyan dish of steamed semolina served with meat and vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups couscous, 1kg lamb, 2 onions, 4 carrots, 2 zucchinis, 1 can chickpeas, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp harissa, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp paprika, 1/2 tsp turmeric, salt, olive oil
 Instructions: Steam couscous and set aside. Sauté onions, add meat and brown. Add spices, tomato paste, and water, simmer until meat is tender. Add carrots, zucchinis, and chickpeas, cook until vegetables are tender. Serve meat and vegetables over couscous.

Description: A Liechtenstein dish of grated and fried potatoes, often served with meat or cheese
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 potatoes, salt, pepper, butter
 Instructions: Grate potatoes, season with salt and pepper. Heat butter in a pan, add grated potatoes, press down to form a flat cake. Cook until golden brown on both sides. Serve hot.

Description: A Lithuanian dish of potato dumplings filled with meat, usually served with sour cream and bacon
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 potatoes, 500g ground meat, 1 onion, 1 egg, salt, pepper, sour cream, bacon
 Instructions: Grate potatoes, squeeze out excess liquid. Mix with egg, salt, and pepper. Shape into dumplings, fill with ground meat and chopped onions. Boil until cooked through. Serve with sour cream and fried bacon.

Description: A Luxembourgish dish of smoked pork collar served with broad beans and potatoes
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg smoked pork collar, 500g broad beans, 4 potatoes, 2 onions, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp mustard, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Boil smoked pork collar until tender, set aside. Sauté onions and garlic in oil. Add broad beans, potatoes, mustard, salt, and pepper. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Serve pork with beans and potatoes.

Description: A traditional Malagasy stew made with beef, pork, or chicken, and leafy greens
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g beef, 500g pork, 1 bunch of leafy greens, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tbsp tomato paste, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown beef and pork in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until soft. Add tomato paste, salt, and pepper. Add leafy greens, beef, and pork, simmer until meat is tender. Serve hot.

Description: A Malawian staple food made from ground maize, often served with meat or vegetable stew
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups maize flour, 4 cups water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water with a pinch of salt. Gradually add maize flour, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture thickens and pulls away from the sides of the pot. Shape into balls and serve with sauce.

Description: A Malaysian dish of rice cooked in coconut milk, served with anchovies, peanuts, and boiled eggs
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 cup water, 1 tsp salt, 1 cucumber, 2 boiled eggs, 1/2 cup fried anchovies, 1/2 cup roasted peanuts, sambal
 Instructions: Cook rice with coconut milk, water, and salt. Serve with sliced cucumber, boiled eggs, fried anchovies, roasted peanuts, and sambal.

Description: A Maldivian fish soup, typically made with tuna, coconut, and lime
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g tuna, 4 cups water, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tsp chili powder, salt
 Instructions: Boil tuna, onions, garlic, and ginger in water until tuna is cooked. Add chili powder and salt, simmer for 10 mins. Serve with rice and lime.

Description: A Malian dish of millet or sorghum porridge, often served with a sauce made from meat or vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups millet flour, 4 cups water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water with a pinch of salt. Gradually add millet flour, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture thickens and pulls away from the sides of the pot. Shape into balls and serve with sauce.

Description: A Maltese dish of rabbit stewed in wine and garlic
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 rabbit, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup red wine, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown rabbit in oil, set aside. Sauté onions and garlic until soft. Add wine, tomato paste, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add rabbit, simmer until tender. Serve with potatoes or bread.

Description: A popular dish in the Marshall Islands, made with spam, rice, and nori (seaweed)
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 can spam, 2 cups sushi rice, 2 cups water, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup sugar, nori (seaweed)
 Instructions: Cook rice with water. Slice spam, fry in a pan with soy sauce and sugar until caramelized. Shape rice into small blocks, top with spam slice, wrap with nori. Serve.

Description: A Mauritanian dish of fish cooked with rice, vegetables, and spices
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1kg fish, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 carrots, 2 bell peppers, 1/2 cup tomato paste, 1 tbsp parsley, 1 tsp thyme, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook fish with onions, tomatoes, and tomato paste until tender, set aside. Sauté vegetables in oil, add parsley, thyme, salt, and pepper. Add rice, cover with water, simmer until cooked. Serve fish over rice and vegetables.

Description: A Mauritian flatbread stuffed with yellow split peas, often served with curry
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup yellow split peas, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp cumin, salt, oil
 Instructions: Cook split peas with garlic and cumin, mash into a paste. Mix flour with water and salt to form dough. Roll out dough, fill with split pea paste, fold and seal. Cook on a hot griddle until golden brown. Serve with curry.

Description: A Mexican dish of corn tortillas filled with various meats, cheese, and vegetables
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg meat (beef, chicken, or pork), 12 corn tortillas, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp cumin, salt, pepper, toppings (cheese, lettuce, salsa, etc.)
 Instructions: Brown meat with onions, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt, and pepper. Warm tortillas on a griddle. Fill tortillas with meat, top with desired toppings. Serve hot.

Description: A traditional Micronesian dish of taro root cooked with coconut cream
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg taro root, 1 cup coconut cream, 1 onion, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Peel and dice taro root, boil until tender. Sauté onions in oil, add coconut cream, salt, and pepper. Add cooked taro, simmer until flavors meld. Serve hot.

Description: A Moldovan dish of cornmeal porridge, often served with cheese, sour cream, or pork
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups cornmeal, 4 cups water, 1 tsp salt, cheese, sour cream
 Instructions: Boil water with salt. Gradually add cornmeal, stirring constantly. Cook until thickened and pulls away from the sides of the pot. Serve with cheese and sour cream.

Description: A Monacan pastry filled with ricotta cheese and Swiss chard, usually fried or baked
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 1 cup Swiss chard, 1 egg, 1 onion, salt, pepper, oil for frying
 Instructions: Mix flour, ricotta, Swiss chard, egg, onion, salt, and pepper to form a filling. Roll out dough, cut into circles, fill with mixture, fold and seal. Fry in hot oil until golden brown. Serve hot.

Description: A Mongolian dish of steamed dumplings filled with meat, typically mutton or beef
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups flour, 1 cup water, 500g minced meat (beef or mutton), 1 onion, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Mix flour and water to form dough, let rest. Mix minced meat with chopped onions, salt, and pepper. Roll out dough, cut into circles, fill with meat mixture, fold and seal. Steam until cooked through. Serve hot.

Description: A Montenegrin dish of grilled minced meat sausages, often served with flatbread
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 500g ground lamb, 1 onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp baking soda, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly, refrigerate for a few hours. Shape into small sausages. Grill or fry until cooked through. Serve with pita bread and onions.

Description: A Moroccan stew made with meat, vegetables, and spices, cooked in a clay pot
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg lamb, 2 onions, 2 carrots, 2 zucchinis, 1 cup chickpeas, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ras el hanout, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp ginger, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown lamb in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, carrots, and zucchinis until soft. Add lamb, chickpeas, ras el hanout, cinnamon, ginger, salt, and pepper. Cover and simmer until lamb is tender. Serve hot.

Description: A Mozambican dish of chicken marinated with peri-peri sauce and grilled
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 1/4 cup peri-peri sauce, 2 cloves garlic, 1 lemon, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Marinate chicken in peri-peri sauce, minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for 2 hours. Grill or roast chicken until cooked through. Serve with rice or salad.

Description: A Burmese dish of rice noodles in a fish-based soup, often garnished with coriander and lime
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fish, 2 onions, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tbsp lemongrass, 1 cup rice noodles, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp fish sauce, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Boil fish, flake and set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, and lemongrass in oil. Add fish, turmeric, fish sauce, salt, and pepper. Simmer until flavors meld. Serve over rice noodles.

Description: A Namibian dish of air-dried meat, usually beef or game
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg beef, 1/2 cup vinegar, 2 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp coriander, 1 tsp black pepper
 Instructions: Marinate beef in vinegar, salt, coriander, and black pepper for 24 hours. Hang to dry in a well-ventilated area for 3-7 days until firm. Slice thinly and serve.

Description: A Nauruan dish of fish cooked in coconut milk, often served with rice
Recipe:
ngredients: 500g fish fillets, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 lemon, 1 onion, 1 tomato, salt, pepper
 Instructions: Dice fish fillets, marinate in lemon juice and salt for 30 mins. Drain, mix with chopped onions and tomatoes. Add coconut milk, season with salt and pepper. Serve chilled.

Description: A traditional Nepali meal of steamed rice and lentil soup, served with vegetable curries and pickles
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1 cup lentils, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook rice and set aside. Boil lentils until tender. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in oil, add tomatoes, turmeric, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper. Add cooked lentils, simmer until flavors meld. Serve with rice.

Description: A Dutch dish of mashed potatoes mixed with various vegetables, often served with sausage
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 potatoes, 2 cups kale, 1 onion, 1 sausage, salt, pepper, butter
 Instructions: Boil potatoes and kale until tender, drain. Mash with butter, salt, and pepper. Sauté onions and sausage until browned, mix into mashed potatoes. Serve hot.

Description: A New Zealand dessert of meringue topped with whipped cream and fresh fruit
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 egg whites, 1 cup sugar, 1 tsp vinegar, 1 tsp cornstarch, whipped cream, fresh fruit
 Instructions: Beat egg whites until stiff, gradually add sugar, beat until glossy. Fold in vinegar and cornstarch. Shape into a circle on baking paper, bake at 150°C for 1 hour. Cool, top with whipped cream and fresh fruit. Serve.

Description: A Nicaraguan dish of rice and beans, often served with cheese and plantains
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 1 cup cooked black beans, 1 onion, 1 red bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp Lizano sauce, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil. Add rice and beans, cook until heated through. Stir in Lizano sauce, season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.

Description: A Nigerian dish of pounded yam or cassava, served with a variety of soups and stews
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups cassava flour, 4 cups water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water with a pinch of salt. Gradually add cassava flour, stirring constantly. Cook until mixture thickens and pulls away from the sides of the pot. Shape into balls and serve with soup or stew.

Description: A popular West African dish of rice cooked in a flavorful tomato and pepper sauce
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1kg chicken, 2 onions, 4 tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup tomato paste, 1 tsp thyme, 1 tsp curry powder, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Brown chicken in oil, set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, tomatoes, and bell pepper until soft. Stir in tomato paste, thyme, curry powder, salt, and pepper. Add rice and chicken, cover with water, simmer until rice is cooked and chicken is tender. Serve hot.

Description: A Korean dish of fermented vegetables, typically cabbage, seasoned with chili pepper, garlic, and ginger
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 napa cabbage, 1/4 cup salt, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger, 1 tbsp sugar, 2 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp chili powder
 Instructions: Chop cabbage, sprinkle with salt, let sit for 2 hours. Rinse and drain. Mix garlic, ginger, sugar, fish sauce, and chili powder. Coat cabbage with mixture, pack into a jar, ferment at room temperature for 1-5 days. Serve chilled.

Description: A North Macedonian dish of baked beans cooked with onions and peppers
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups white beans, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp paprika, 1 tsp cumin, salt, pepper, oil
 Instructions: Cook beans until tender, set aside. Sauté onions and garlic in oil, add tomatoes, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper. Add beans, simmer until thickened. Serve hot.

Description: A Norwegian dish of meatballs made from ground meat, served with potatoes and gravy
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 onion, 1 egg, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, butter for frying
 Instructions: Mix all ingredients thoroughly. Shape into small balls. Fry in butter until golden brown and cooked through. Serve with boiled potatoes and gravy.

Description: A traditional Omani dish where marinated lamb is slow-cooked in an underground sand oven, resulting in tender, flavorful meat.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole lamb (about 10-12 kg), 10 cloves garlic, 2 tbsp ground cumin, 2 tbsp ground coriander, 1 tbsp ground cinnamon, 1 tbsp ground black pepper, 1 tbsp ground cloves, 1 cup vinegar, banana leaves
 Instructions: Score the lamb and rub it with garlic and vinegar. Mix all the spices and rub onto the lamb. Wrap the lamb in banana leaves and then in a sack. Place the lamb in an underground sand oven, cover with hot coals, and cook for 24-48 hours until tender.

Description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish layered with spiced meat, often garnished with saffron and fried onions.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g basmati rice, 1kg chicken, 200g yogurt, 2 large onions, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp ginger paste, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander, 1 tsp garam masala, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chili powder, 2 tbsp ghee or oil, saffron threads soaked in warm milk, salt
 Instructions: Cook rice until 70% done and set aside. Sauté onions in ghee, add garlic and ginger, then add chicken and brown. Add tomatoes, spices, and yogurt, cook until chicken is tender. In a pot, layer rice and chicken mixture, sprinkle with saffron milk. Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.

Description: A comforting chicken soup with green papaya and chili leaves, known for its gingery broth.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg chicken, 1 green papaya (sliced), 2 cups chili leaves, 1 large onion, 4 cloves garlic, 1 thumb-sized ginger, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 tbsp fish sauce, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger until fragrant. Add chicken and fish sauce, cook until chicken is done. Add chicken broth and green papaya, simmer until papaya is tender. Stir in chili leaves and season with salt and pepper.

Description: A Palestinian dish featuring sumac-spiced chicken baked on flatbread, offering a tangy and savory flavor.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 4 large onions, 1/4 cup sumac, 1/4 cup olive oil, 4 pieces of flatbread, 1 tsp allspice, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Sauté onions in olive oil until soft, add chicken pieces and brown. Sprinkle with sumac, allspice, salt, and pepper. Place the mixture on flatbreads and bake in the oven at 180°C for 20 minutes.

Description: A hearty Panamanian stew made with chicken and root vegetables, seasoned with culantro and oregano.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 2 yucca roots (peeled and chopped), 2 plantains (peeled and chopped), 2 ears of corn (cut into chunks), 1 large onion, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp oregano, 1 bunch culantro, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Cook chicken with garlic and onion until browned. Add yucca, plantains, corn, and enough water to cover. Season with oregano, culantro, salt, and pepper. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Description: A traditional Papua New Guinean dish where pork and vegetables are cooked in a pit lined with hot stones, often with coconut milk added.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg pork, 4 sweet potatoes, 4 taro roots, 2 bunches of greens, 1 liter coconut milk, banana leaves
 Instructions: Layer pork, sweet potatoes, taro, and greens in a large pit lined with hot stones. Cover with banana leaves and cook for several hours until everything is tender. Add coconut milk before serving.

Description: A dense, cheesy cornbread from Paraguay, often enjoyed as a savory side dish.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g cornmeal, 200g cheese (grated), 1 liter milk, 1 large onion (chopped), 4 eggs, 2 tbsp butter, salt
 Instructions: Sauté onions in butter until soft. Mix cornmeal, cheese, milk, and onions. Beat eggs and add to the mixture. Pour into a baking dish and bake at 180°C for 30-40 minutes until firm and golden.

Description: A popular Peruvian dish where fresh fish is marinated in lime juice, mixed with onions, cilantro, and chili peppers.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fresh fish (cubed), 1 cup lime juice, 1 red onion (thinly sliced), 1 bunch cilantro (chopped), 1-2 chili peppers (chopped), salt
 Instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice for 10-15 minutes until opaque. Mix with onions, cilantro, and chili peppers. Season with salt and serve immediately.

Description: A Filipino dish of marinated pork or chicken, simmered in vinegar, soy sauce, and garlic, creating a rich and savory flavor.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg pork or chicken, 1/2 cup vinegar, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 4 cloves garlic, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp black peppercorns, 1 tbsp oil, salt
 Instructions: Marinate meat in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, bay leaves, and peppercorns for at least 1 hour. Heat oil in a pot and brown the meat. Add marinade and simmer until meat is tender and sauce is reduced.

Description: A traditional Polish stew made with sauerkraut and a variety of meats, slow-cooked for a rich, hearty meal.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg sauerkraut, 500g pork shoulder, 500g beef, 200g sausage, 1 large onion, 200g mushrooms, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp allspice, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Cook meats with onions and mushrooms until browned. Add sauerkraut, bay leaves, allspice, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 2-3 hours until flavors meld.

Description: A Portuguese dish made from shredded salt cod, potatoes, and eggs, garnished with olives.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g salt cod, 4 large potatoes, 2 onions, 6 eggs, 1/2 cup olives, 1/4 cup olive oil, salt
 Instructions: Desalt and cook cod, then shred. Sauté onions in olive oil, add shredded cod and thinly sliced potatoes. Beat eggs and add to the mixture. Cook until eggs are set. Garnish with olives.

Description: A Qatari spiced rice dish with meat, often lamb or chicken, cooked with tomatoes and a blend of spices.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g basmati rice, 1kg lamb or chicken, 2 large onions, 2 tomatoes, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp cinnamon, 2 tbsp ghee or oil, salt, 4 cups water
 Instructions: Sauté onions in ghee, add meat and brown. Add tomatoes, spices, and water, cook until meat is done. Add rice and simmer until rice is cooked.

Description: A Romanian dish of cabbage leaves stuffed with a mixture of ground pork and rice, simmered in tomato sauce.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 large cabbage, 500g ground pork, 1 cup cooked rice, 1 large onion, 1 bunch dill, 1 can tomato sauce, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Mix ground pork with cooked rice, chopped onion, and dill. Blanch cabbage leaves and wrap the pork mixture in them. Place in a pot, cover with tomato sauce, and simmer until cooked through.

Description: A Russian beet soup with cabbage and potatoes, served with a dollop of sour cream and fresh dill.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 large beets, 1/2 head cabbage, 4 potatoes, 2 carrots, 1 large onion, 4 cups beef broth, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1 bunch dill, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Cook beets, cabbage, potatoes, and carrots in beef broth until tender. Sauté onions and add to the soup. Serve with a dollop of sour cream and fresh dill.

Description: A Rwandan dish of cassava leaves cooked with peanuts, onions, and garlic in palm oil, typically served with rice or plantains.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g cassava leaves, 200g ground peanuts, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup palm oil, salt
 Instructions: Cook cassava leaves with ground peanuts, chopped onions, and garlic in palm oil until tender. Season with salt and serve with rice or plantains.

Description: A traditional dish from Saint Kitts and Nevis made with salted fish sautéed with onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes, often served with boiled dumplings or breadfruit.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g saltfish, 1 large onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 2 sprigs thyme, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Soak saltfish overnight and boil until tender. Flake fish and set aside. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, and thyme, cook until soft. Add flaked fish, season with salt and pepper, and simmer for 10 minutes.

Description: A beloved dish in Saint Lucia featuring salted fish mixed with green bananas, onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g saltfish, 6 green bananas, 1 large onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Soak saltfish overnight and boil until tender. Flake fish and set aside. Boil green bananas until tender, peel and slice. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add flaked fish and sliced bananas, season with salt and pepper, and cook for 5 minutes.

Description: A classic dish from Saint Vincent and the Grenadines, where breadfruit is roasted and served with fried jackfish.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 breadfruit, 500g jackfish, 1 large onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 1 lime, salt and pepper, vegetable oil
 Instructions: Roast breadfruit until tender, peel and slice. Season jackfish with lime juice, salt, and pepper. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in oil. Fry jackfish until golden brown. Serve with roasted breadfruit.

Description: A refreshing Samoan dish where fresh fish is marinated in coconut cream with onions, tomatoes, and chilies.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fresh fish (cubed), 1 cup coconut cream, 1 large onion, 1 bunch spring onions, 2 tomatoes, 2 chilies, salt
 Instructions: Marinate fish in lime juice and salt for 10 minutes. Mix coconut cream, chopped onion, spring onions, tomatoes, and chilies. Add marinated fish and mix well. Serve chilled.

Description: A famous dessert from San Marino consisting of layered wafers and chocolate-hazelnut filling.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g wafers, 200g chocolate, 100g hazelnuts, 100g sugar, 100g butter
 Instructions: Melt chocolate and butter in a double boiler. Stir in sugar and chopped hazelnuts. Layer wafers with chocolate mixture. Chill until set, then slice.

Description: A flavorful fish and vegetable stew from Sao Tome and Principe, typically cooked with palm oil and seasoned with garlic.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fish, 2 onions, 2 tomatoes, 200g spinach, 1 eggplant, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp palm oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in palm oil. Add fish and brown. Add tomatoes, spinach, eggplant, and water. Season with salt and pepper. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

Description: A traditional Saudi Arabian spiced rice dish with chicken or lamb, garnished with raisins and almonds.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg chicken or lamb, 2 cups basmati rice, 2 large onions, 2 tomatoes, 1 cup yogurt, 2 tbsp baharat spice mix, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp saffron, 1/4 cup raisins, 1/4 cup slivered almonds, 4 cloves garlic, salt
 Instructions: Cook rice with saffron and set aside. Sauté onions and garlic, add meat and brown. Add tomatoes, spices, yogurt, and water, simmer until meat is tender. Layer rice with meat mixture, top with raisins and almonds. Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.

Description: A Senegalese fish and rice dish, often cooked with tomatoes, onions, carrots, and cabbage, flavored with parsley and garlic.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg fish, 2 cups rice, 1 large onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 carrot, 1 cabbage, 1 bell pepper, 1 bunch parsley, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp tomato paste, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Cook fish with garlic and set aside. Sauté onions, add tomatoes, tomato paste, and chopped vegetables, cook until tender. Add rice and water, simmer until rice is cooked. Mix in cooked fish and parsley.

Description: A popular Serbian dish of grilled minced meat sausages, often served with flatbread and onions.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp salt, 1/2 tsp black pepper, 1 tbsp vegetable oil
 Instructions: Mix ground beef with chopped onions, garlic, and spices. Form into small sausages. Grill or fry until cooked through. Serve with flatbread and onions.

Description: A staple in Seychelles cuisine where whole fish is grilled and seasoned with garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole fish, 2 cloves garlic, 1 lemon, 1 tbsp olive oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Clean and season fish with garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill until cooked through and golden brown.

Description: A hearty chicken stew from Sierra Leone cooked with onions, tomatoes, and peanut butter for a rich, savory flavor.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg chicken, 2 large onions, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup peanut butter, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil. Add chicken and brown. Add tomatoes and water, simmer until chicken is tender. Stir in peanut butter, season with salt and pepper, and cook until sauce thickens.

Description: A famous Singaporean dish of poached chicken served with fragrant rice, accompanied by ginger, garlic, and chili sauces.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 whole chicken, 4 cups chicken broth, 2 cups jasmine rice, 1 large onion, 4 cloves garlic, 1 thumb-sized ginger, 1 bunch cilantro, 1 cucumber, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Boil chicken with garlic, ginger, and onion until cooked. Remove chicken and set aside. Cook rice in chicken broth. Serve chicken sliced with rice, garnished with cilantro and cucumber.

Description: A traditional Slovak dish of potato dumplings mixed with bryndza cheese, topped with crispy bacon and served with sour cream.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g potato dumplings, 200g bryndza cheese, 100g bacon, 1 large onion, 1 tbsp sour cream
 Instructions: Cook dumplings in salted water and drain. Mix with bryndza cheese. Sauté bacon and onions until crispy, sprinkle over dumplings. Serve with sour cream.

Description: A Slovenian sausage made from pork, seasoned with garlic and paprika, typically served with bread.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g pork sausage, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tbsp vegetable oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil. Add sausage and cook until browned. Sprinkle with paprika and serve with bread.

Description: A staple food in the Solomon Islands made from boiled and mashed taro root mixed with coconut milk.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g taro root, 2 cups coconut milk, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, salt
 Instructions: Boil taro root until tender, mash with coconut milk. Sauté onions and garlic, mix into taro. Season with salt.

Description: A type of Somali flatbread made from flour, water, and salt, cooked on a hot griddle until golden brown.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g flour, 1 tsp salt, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, water
 Instructions: Mix flour, salt, and oil, add water to form a dough. Let rest for 30 minutes. Roll into thin circles and cook on a hot griddle until golden brown.

Description: A classic South African dish where spiced minced meat is baked with an egg-based topping, often served with yellow rice.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 cup milk, 1 cup bread crumbs, 1 tbsp curry powder, 1 tbsp vegetable oil
 Instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil. Add ground beef and brown. Mix in bread crumbs soaked in milk, add curry powder. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

Description: A staple Korean side dish of fermented cabbage mixed with chili powder, garlic, ginger, and fish sauce.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 large cabbage, 1/2 cup salt, 2 tbsp gochugaru (Korean chili powder), 4 cloves garlic, 1 thumb-sized ginger, 2 tbsp fish sauce, 1 tbsp sugar
 Instructions: Slice cabbage and mix with salt, let sit for 1 hour. Rinse and drain. Mix gochugaru, minced garlic, ginger, fish sauce, and sugar. Combine with cabbage. Pack into jars and ferment for 3-5 days.

Description: A traditional dish in South Sudan made from mashed fava beans seasoned with garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil, served with bread.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fava beans, 4 cloves garlic, 1 lemon, 1 tbsp olive oil, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Soak fava beans overnight and boil until tender. Mash beans with garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Serve with bread.

Description: A famous Spanish rice dish cooked with a variety of seafood, saffron, and vegetables, known for its vibrant colors and rich flavors.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups rice, 1kg seafood mix (shrimp, mussels, clams), 1 large onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 bell pepper, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tsp saffron, 4 cups chicken broth, 1/4 cup olive oil, salt
 Instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in olive oil. Add tomatoes and saffron, cook until soft. Add rice and broth, simmer until rice is nearly cooked. Add seafood mix and cook until seafood is done. Season with salt.

Description: A Sri Lankan sour fish curry cooked with tamarind paste and coconut milk, offering a tangy and creamy taste.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1kg fish, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 thumb-sized ginger, salt
 Instructions: Cut fish into pieces, season with salt. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add tamarind paste and coconut milk, simmer until thickened. Add fish and cook until done.

Description: A Sudanese flatbread made from sorghum flour, typically served with stews and other savory dishes.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g sorghum flour, 1 liter water, 1 tsp salt
 Instructions: Boil water and add salt. Gradually stir in sorghum flour, cook until thickened. Serve with stew.

Description: A traditional dish from Suriname made with chicken, celery, and tomatoes, typically served with rice.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g chicken, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp lime juice, 1 large onion, 1 bell pepper, 2 tomatoes, 4 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp tomato paste, 1/2 cup chopped celery, 3 tbsp butter, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and lime juice. Sauté onions, garlic, and bell pepper in butter. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, and celery, cook until soft. Add marinated chicken, season with salt and pepper, and simmer until chicken is tender. Serve with rice.

Description: A Swedish dish of ground beef mixed with onions, garlic, and breadcrumbs, formed into meatballs and served with lingonberry sauce.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 large onion, 2 cloves garlic, 1 egg, 1/2 cup breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup milk, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Mix ground beef with chopped onion, minced garlic, egg, breadcrumbs, milk, salt, and pepper. Form into meatballs and fry in butter until cooked through. Serve with lingonberry sauce and mashed potatoes.

Description: A Swiss dish where Gruyère and Emmental cheeses are melted with white wine and served with bread cubes for dipping.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 200g Gruyère cheese, 200g Emmental cheese, 1 clove garlic, 1 cup white wine, 1 tbsp cornstarch, 1 tbsp kirsch, nutmeg, black pepper, baguette
 Instructions: Rub pot with garlic clove. Heat wine and bring to a simmer. Gradually add grated cheeses, stirring until melted. Dissolve cornstarch in kirsch, add to pot. Season with nutmeg and pepper. Serve with bread cubes.

Description: A Syrian dish of ground lamb mixed with bulgur wheat and pine nuts, formed into patties and fried until golden brown.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g ground lamb, 1 large onion, 1 cup bulgur wheat, 1 tbsp pine nuts, 1 tsp allspice, 1 tsp cinnamon, salt and pepper
 Instructions: Mix ground lamb with chopped onion, bulgur wheat, pine nuts, allspice, cinnamon, salt, and pepper. Form into oval patties and fry until golden brown. Serve with yogurt sauce.

Description: A traditional Tajik dish of yogurt mixed with onions, tomatoes, cucumbers, and soaked pita bread.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 200g yogurt, 1 large onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cucumbers, 1 bunch cilantro, 2 pita breads, 1 tbsp vegetable oil, salt
 Instructions: Tear pita bread into pieces and soak in water. Mix yogurt with chopped onion, tomatoes, cucumbers, and cilantro. Squeeze water from pita bread and add to yogurt mixture. Drizzle with vegetable oil and sprinkle with salt.

Description: A staple in Tanzanian cuisine made from maize flour, cooked into a thick porridge and served with meat or vegetable stew.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups maize flour, 4 cups water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water and add a pinch of salt. Gradually add maize flour, stirring continuously until thickened. Serve with meat or vegetable stew.

Description: A famous Thai dish of rice noodles stir-fried with shrimp, eggs, bean sprouts, and chives, flavored with fish sauce and tamarind paste.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 200g rice noodles, 200g shrimp, 2 eggs, 1 cup bean sprouts, 1 bunch chives, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp fish sauce, 1 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 lime, crushed peanuts
 Instructions: Soak rice noodles in water. Sauté garlic in oil, add shrimp and cook until pink. Push shrimp to one side, scramble eggs in the same pan. Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, and sugar. Stir in bean sprouts and chives. Serve with lime wedges and crushed peanuts.

Description: A popular dish from Timor-Leste where fish is marinated in tamarind paste and cooked with coconut milk.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g fish, 2 cloves garlic, 1 thumb-sized ginger, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 large onion, salt
 Instructions: Marinate fish in tamarind paste and salt. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add marinated fish and cook until browned. Pour in coconut milk, simmer until sauce thickens. Serve with rice.

Description: A staple dish in Togo made from cassava flour, cooked into a thick dough and served with soup or stew.
Recipe:
Ingredients: 500g cassava flour, 4 cups water, salt
 Instructions: Boil water and add a pinch of salt. Gradually add cassava flour, stirring continuously until thickened. Serve with soup or stew.

Description: A Tongan dish of lamb cooked in coconut milk and soy sauce, often served with taro or yam.
Recipe:
